price: 73. Waxaanu rumeynay Rabbigayo si uu noogu dhaafo gefefkayaga iyo waxaad nagu khasabtay ee (barashda) sixirka ah. Alle baana khayr badan (abaal marin ahaan), oo daa’insanaan badan12 (cadaab ahaan).
arabic: إِنَّآ ءَامَنَّا بِرَبِّنَا لِيَغۡفِرَ لَنَا خَطَٰيَٰنَا وَمَآ أَكۡرَهۡتَنَا عَلَيۡهِ مِنَ ٱلسِّحۡرِۗ وَٱللَّهُ خَيۡرٞ وَأَبۡقَىٰٓ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: innā āmannā birabbinā liyaghfira lanā khaṭāyānā wamā akrahtanā ʿalayhi mina al-siḥ'ri wal-lahu khayrun wa-abqā
